A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People who hate this movie are people who are against change. This movie took chances and in my opinion it paid off. Just because people’s theories weren’t correct or questions weren’t answered they decide this movie isn’t good. The questions we did get answers to were because they were the ones that mattered and the ones that weren’t answered means they simply aren’t important to the story. This movie is a Star Wars story that takes chances and paid off. Other then one or two scenes and a few misses on trying to hard on comedy a perfect movie.
